alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:37PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNTERDON...NORTH CENTRAL MERCER...SOUTHWESTERN SOMERSET AND NORTH CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTIES... At 137 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sand Brook, or 17 miles west of Somerville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Byram, Flemington, Hopewell, Frenchtown, Rocky Hill, Stockton, Skillman, Flagtown, Sergeantsville, Cloverhill, Belle Mead, Lumberville, Sand Brook, Erwinna, White House Station, Raritan and Heathcote. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
